A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O P R S T U X Y

A

action - Variable in class Character
Represents the current method of movement of the Character as follows:
1 - walk
2 - strafe
3 - turn
addCharacter(String, Coord) - Method in class Field
Adds a Character to the Field.
addPixel(int, int, int) - Method in class Sprite
Adds a pixel to the Sprite.
addPixel(int, int, Color) - Method in class Sprite
Adds a pixel to the Sprite.
anim - Variable in class Character
Represents current state sprite of Character as follows:
1 - stand_right
2 - stand_left
3 - walk_right
4 - walk_left
area - Variable in class Character
Field in which this Character resides.
atk - Variable in class Character
Current attack strength of this Character.
atk() - Method in class Character
 
atk() - Method in class Fighter
Calculates how the Fighter's atk grows as it levels up.
attack() - Method in class Character
 
attack() - Method in class Fighter
Tells the Character to attack.
